functions.name: initInjections
functions.description: injects the javascript that adds buttons to the messages in the 3pane view

events.name: onButtonClicked
events.description: called when a button on a message in the 3pane view is clicked

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: the id of the message correponding to this event (and button)

parameters.name: buttonId
parameters.description: the id of the html element of the button that emited this event
